name: Nightmare on Nobels Allé 7
description:
Nightmare on Nobels Allé 7 is a 3D first person hack and slash shooter. The game revolves around a student that falls asleep during class and gets trapped in a nightmare. You must fight through hordes of faceless students with the help of a Desert Eagle and a Katana in five action packed levels.  Defeat your own teachers in challenging boss battles to decide the fate of your grades! 

We're a group of seven students at Södertörn University located in Huddinge, Stockholm, Sweden. During a course we developed a game called Nightmare on Nobels Allé 7 (NONA). We hope that people will play and enjoy it as much as we have enjoyed making it. 

Download the .zip file extract up the project in a separate folder. Open up the .exe file named NONA.

OS: Windows 7 (SP1+) or higher
Processor: Intel Core i5-7400 / Ryzen 5 1600
Ram: 4GB
GPU: GeForce GTX 1050 / Radeon R9 285 / 380
DirectX: DX10, DX11, DX12
Storage: 1.2GB

Erik Berglöf - Character Artist, Weapon Artist, Rigging, 2D and 3D Graphics

Hope you'll enjoy our little game and please leave us some feedback.
